creator: protel hotelsoftware GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Now is the time to leap out of the Stone Age and get protel’s new digital registration card technology. With a tablet and protel’s digital registration card your hotel can have:

Faster check-in processes
Guests can see their data on the tablet at check-in and make adjustments/updates to their profile information, including their privacy settings.

Improved accuracy
The profile information is automatically updated in real-time directly to your hotel software (PMS) – no manual data entry and zero transcribing errors.

Legal compliance
100% legal compliance in all countries* – the digital registration card is safely stored with the guest’s signature and can be retrieved and printed at any time.
*Applies to all countries where the option of digital registration cards is allowed. Please contact us to find out any further information.

Digital Registration Cards
• Fast and efficient check-ins
• Directly communicates guest data with your protel PMS
• Just a few taps and a signature
• Reduces contact between staff and guests. No handing over of pens, paper and documents
• Safely and securely stores all necessary documents electronically
• Enables your hotel to be economically and environmentally responsible
• No pen’s and no paper means more trees and less plastic
descriptionShort: Digital registration cards for protel Air

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: - Initial Release

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Connection problems within the app were fixed.
- Hotels working with the Sydney data center now also have access.
- The "accept GDPR" button could disappear from the screen - this bug has been fixed.
- When the web app is opened from protel Air, no further login to the app is required (auto login).
- The signature is now also transferred to the web app.
- Various bug fixes and performance optimizations.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- protel Air: Invoices can be displayed in the app again.
- The incorrect display of the date fields in the PDF has been fixed.
- If the app was minimized, connection problems could occur.
- When the app is open, your display remains activated.
- In addition to the DSGVO terms and conditions, the T&Cs of your hotel can now also be stored.
- You can now customize all marketing labels in the "GDPR/Privacy" tab.
- You can now generate a sample PDF to review your design.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Profile: various new options to make email, phone and passport data optional for children and/or accompanying adults.
- Profile: New fields: mobile phone, maiden name*, first name at birth*, mother's maiden name*, mother's first name*.
- Reservations and invoices can now be closed remotely.
- Improved validation of email and phone number.
- Bugfixes.
* protel AIR only

- New option: automated check-in
- New color: navigation background color
- ONLY FOR PROTEL SPE/MPE: New Option: hide marketing opt-ins
- Performance improvements
- Various Bugfixes for the remote control
- Other bugfixes

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- ONLY FOR SPE/MPE: New feature: billing addresses. These are saved as secondary addresses in the primary guest's profile.
- ONLY FOR SPE/MPE: The app can now automatically perform 'change name' when the name of the primary guest changes.
- Guest profile: New settings for default language, country and nationality.
- Guest profile: The Signature field is now hidden if it's not required.
- Guest profile: Signature and opt-ins are always hidden for children.
- Bug fixes and UI improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Auto-check-in can now be enforced with the help of a new setting even if the room is not clean.
- There will be four possible default settings instead of only two (for countries, nationalities, etc.).
- You can assign a name for the device (for multiple devices).
- The font size is customizable (depending on the device, please test!)
- New: Feedback form for your responses!
- On-Prem only: Opt-In Labels have been fixed

title: protel dSignature

creator: protel hotelsoftware GmbH
descriptionHtml:
Now is the time to leap out of the Stone Age and get protel’s new digital registration card technology. With a tablet and protel’s digital registration card your hotel can have:

Faster check-in processes
Guests can see their data on the tablet at check-in and make adjustments/updates to their profile information, including their privacy settings.

Improved accuracy
The profile information is automatically updated in real-time directly to your hotel software (PMS) – no manual data entry and zero transcribing errors.

Legal compliance
100% legal compliance in all countries* – the digital registration card is safely stored with the guest’s signature and can be retrieved and printed at any time.
*Applies to all countries where the option of digital registration cards is allowed. Please contact us to find out any further information.

Digital Registration Cards
• Fast and efficient check-ins
• Directly communicates guest data with your protel PMS (protel Air or protel SPE/MPE)
• Just a few taps and a signature
• Reduces contact between staff and guests. No handing over of pens, paper and documents
• Safely and securely stores all necessary documents electronically
• Enables your hotel to be economically and environmentally responsible
• No pen’s and no paper means more trees and less plastic
descriptionShort: Digital registration cards for your protel PMS
